channel.title: Non-random npc drops?

item.title: Non-random npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

ive been wondering how to make npc drop the same items everytime so their not random.
ive tried this but when i kill the cow it crashes the server

item2.java

public static int cow[] = {1739,2530,4287}; public static int cow() { return cow[(int)(cow.length)]; }

npchandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 81 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 397 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 955 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1767 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1766 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1768 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2310) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.cow(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

any suggestions or help?

Read full topic
